shortdesc.ph: Through the virtual network deployed globally, Agora provides API combinations that can be flexibly matched to provide reliable real-time audio and video communications from mobile to mobile and mobile to a Web client.

ul.li: Starting from v2.3.3, Agora C++ API Reference for All Platforms can be downloaded on the Dash platform, see FAQ for details.
Starting from v3.0.0, Agora deprecated the RtcEngineParameters class. All interfaces under this class are covered by the class, please use the class.
When you make an API call to access an Agora SDK, the SDK may return error codes or warning codes:
The IRecordingEngine class provides the main methods that can be invoked by your application.
The class is used to send callback notifications to the application.
The class implements real-time audio and video functions in the specified channel. By creating multiple objects, users can join multiple channels at the same time.
The class monitors and reports the events and data of the specified channel.
The class provides related interfaces for testing audio equipment.
The class provides related interfaces for testing video equipment.

section.title: Statistics event
section.p: After joining the channel, the SDK automatically triggers this group of callbacks every 2 seconds. We provide detailed function descriptions and implementation method documents for these callbacks. For details, please refer to quality monitoring during a call.

section.title: Room management
section.p: We provide detailed scene descriptions, implementation methods, and development notes documents for this group of interfaces. For details, please refer to Join Multi-channel.

section.title: Screen sharing
section.p: We provide detailed scene descriptions, implementation methods, and development notes documents for this group of methods. For details, please refer to Screen Sharing.

section.title: 1. Audio effect file playback and management
CDN streaming address.
section.p: This method applies only to the `LIVE_BROADCASTING` profile.

section.title: Face Detection
section.p: This method is for Android and iOS only.

section.title: Audio playback device.
section.p: This method is for Android and iOS only.

section.title: In-ear monitoring
section.p: This method is for Android and iOS only.

section.title: Video stream fallback
section.p: We have provided detailed scene descriptions, implementation methods, and development notes documents for this group of APIs. For details, please refer to the video stream fallback.

section.title: Lastmile tests
section.p: We provide detailed scenario descriptions, implementation methods, and development notes documents for this group of APIs. For details, please refer to Checking Network Quality Before Calling.

section.title: 1. Adding media metadata
section.p: This method applies only to the `LIVE_BROADCASTING` profile.

section.title: Live watermark
section.p: This method applies only to the `LIVE_BROADCASTING` profile.

section.title: Equipment management
section.p: Applies to the Windows platform only.
